title: Aluminum
body: User note: Code change proposals to this chapter will be considered by the IBC â€” Structural Code Development Committee during the 2016 (Group B) Code Development Cycle. See explanation on page iv.

title: Scope
body: This chapter shall govern the quality, design, fabrication and erection of aluminum.

title: General
body: Aluminum used for structural purposes in buildings and structures shall comply with AA ASM 35 and AA ADM 1. The nominal loads shall be the minimum design loads required by Chapter 16.
